sentences.en: He arrested the dazed trio for malicious destruction of property.
sentences.cn: 他以“蓄意破坏他人财产罪”逮捕了被摔得晕头转向的三名歹徒.

sentences.en: He was held on remand, charged with causing malicious damage to property.
sentences.cn: 他因恶意破坏财产而被关押候审.

sentences.en: Heretofore all the campus gossip had seemed merely malicious and disrespectful.
sentences.cn: 在这以前,学校里的一切流言蜚语似乎纯粹是恶意的、无礼的.

sentences.en: In the fall of 1943 false and malicious gossip was circulating.
sentences.cn: 在一九四三年秋季,流传着一种捏造和恶意的闲谈.

sentences.en: It was both deliberate and malicious, not to mention clever.
sentences.cn: 这件事是处心积虑、早有预谋的，更不用说其手段的高明。

sentences.en: One cannot inure oneself altogether to such malicious criticism.
sentences.cn: 谁也不能总是忍受这种恶意批评.

sentences.en: Providence had grown mythical in his thoughts, if not malicious.
sentences.cn: 他头脑中产生了一种奇怪的, 如果不是恶意的深谋远虑.

sentences.en: She described the charges as malicious.
sentences.cn: 她说这些指控用意恶毒。

sentences.en: That might merely have been malicious gossip.
sentences.cn: 那也许仅仅是些不怀好意的流言蜚语罢了。

sentences.en: The malicious neighbor spread the gossip.
sentences.cn: 那个不怀好意的邻居散布了流言蜚语.
他们的谈话有点儿心怀不轨.

sentences.en: These are not necessarily hateful, malicious people.
sentences.cn: 这些人不一定心怀仇恨，恶意伤人。

sentences.en: We face a veritable mountain of lies most dishonest and malicious lies.
sentences.cn: 我们面对大量的各种各样的谎言,最不诚实、极其恶毒的谎言.

sentences.en: Would Miss Su spread malicious tales and ruin everything for me?
sentences.cn: 苏小姐会不会大讲坏话,破人好事?

sentences.en: You ought to kick back at such malicious slander.
sentences.cn: 你应当反击这种恶毒的污蔑.
